page.title: 15ADULT CLASSES, RISBOROUGH
page.content: Upholstry class In this particular class there are 7 p ople taking the coarse. It is spread over three terms and covers every aspects of chair reparing and recovering. The adults come purely for pleasure, to learn how to make their chairs more attractive. Pottery class This class has been running for a term both in the morning and evening. The adults come purely for pleasure to relax and talk to their friends. In the class there are an average of ten people. Creche The creche is run every Monday, Wednesday and Thursday normally by two adults. The member of children varies from week to week, but on average there are 2 young children ranging from 16 weeks to 3 years old.
